column3: Pfff... Pfffkohhh... Happywelcome to Earthenshire! How can Tarnotik handhelp?

Tarnotik earcatches that lowlander's friend was twinklycrowned as the new Dawnservant. Will lowlander say goodwords to crownyfriend about Earthenshire? If so, Tarnotik will tell <If(PlayerParameter(4))>her<Else/>him</If> everything about it!
The helphands and the crafthands work hand in hand! The potpact lives on! It is another puffpanty day in Earthenshire!
What kind of place is this?
Tarnotik is a helphand. Helphands' job is to handhelp crafthands with whatever they need to complete their asktasks to the best of their tricksyskill.
Must provide the perfect, comfyfeeling workspace for crafthands...but not too comfyfeeling, or crafthands will not handcraft! Need to find the right balance between stresssoothing and pokeyprodding!
Earthenshire is a Moblin thinkything, built with Moblin claycraft. Now it is home to both we Moblins and the potsworn to whom we offer our home, and our handhelp.
Potsworn are mastercrafters all, and with our handhelp, they make many, many masterpieces. For our playpart, we make much, much jinglyshine!
